original_title: The Long Ride Home: Run For The Wall
overview: Every May, hundreds of motorcyclists depart Ontario, California for a ten-day journey across America to Washington, DC. When the motorcyclists, consisting of veterans, their supporters, families and friends, reach Washington for Memorial Day weekend, they participate in the Rolling Thunder Rally. Rolling Thunder takes place at the Pentagon parking lot with nearly half a million motorcyclists. The event concludes with an emotional memorial at The Wall.
title: The Long Ride Home: Run For The Wall
